Created: Nov. 21st, 2009

Appealing to the crowd to get the job done. At tim

Tags:

Crowd Sourcing

  • Name This

    Get the crowd to name your company. Get a bunch of suggestions, and pay for the one you use.

  • 99 Designs

    Need a logo? Get the crowd to make it. Submit your project. Designers submit their entires. You pay for the one you decide to choose.

  • CrowdSPRING

    You can get just about any graphic design need met at CrowdSPRING, with over 46,000 creative users, users get many submissions for projects with properly awards($).

Crowd Opinions

  • Logo Spire

    Upload your logo to get the crowds opinion before you commit to your logo

Crowd Funding

  • Kickstarter
  • SellaBand

    Lets musicains ask the crowd to pay for their next album

  • Spot.us

    Crowdfund the peice of journalism you have been aching to do. Or check out the pitches, and donate $20 to a story you thing needs to be told.
